name: Ravaged Through Time
description:
This is our entry for CGD Jam 2022. The theme was "There was... and there was not."

Description

Mow your way through a flourishing environment filled with trees, fences and distortion vortexes using a rapid firing minigun. Acquire points for each element destroyed, racing against the clock for a high score. Occasionally warp to a mirror dimension, void of all life apart from the Eye of Distortion. Find and defeat the eye in order to return to the dimension where there was life. It is only a matter of time before there is nothing, whether from the eye's doing or yours.

Controls:

WASD = Move

Space = Jump

Mouse = Look Around

Hold Left Mouse Button = Fire Minigun

Team Credits: Timothe Lafond
